mod_data.name: Fabric API
mod_data.description: Library required by a lot of mods

mod_data.name: Fabric Language Kotlin
mod_data.description: Library required by Zoomify

mod_data.name: MaLiLib
mod_data.description: Library required by Masa's mods

mod_data.name: MagicLib
mod_data.description: Library required by MasaGadget

mod_data.name: oÏ‰o
mod_data.description: Library required by Isometric Renders

mod_data.name: LibJF
mod_data.description: Library required by Respackopts

mod_data.name: CICADA
mod_data.description: Library required by Recursive Resources

mod_data.name: Fzzy Config
mod_data.description: Configuration library required by Particle Core

mod_data.name: Cloth Config API
mod_data.description: Configuration library required by some mods

mod_data.name: YetAnotherConfigLib
mod_data.description: Configuration library required by Zoomify

mod_data.name: Carpet
mod_data.description: The most important mod for technical Minecraft; it comes with tons of useful features and commands

mod_data.name: Carpet Extra
mod_data.description: Extra features for Carpet

mod_data.name: Carpet TIS Addition
mod_data.description: Very useful Carpet extension with lots of new rules and tools, in particular for doing stuff in creative mode

mod_data.name: Essential Addons
mod_data.description: A Carpet extension that adds some handy commands and rules

mod_data.name: JoaCarpet
mod_data.description: A small Carpet extension with a few useful features for redstone and storage tech

mod_data.name: Doormat
mod_data.description: A Carpet extension with fun features

mod_data.name: Lithium
mod_data.description: Improves **server-side** performance without affecting vanilla game logic

mod_data.name: Sodium
mod_data.description: The fastest rendering optimization mod for Minecraft

mod_data.name: Enhanced Block Entities
mod_data.description: Reduces block entity FPS lag and improves their visuals

mod_data.name: EntityCulling
mod_data.description: Hides entities and block entities that are not visible

mod_data.name: More Culling
mod_data.description: Changes how multiple types of culling are handled to improve performance

mod_data.name: Particle Core
mod_data.description: Optimises particle rendering

mod_data.name: ModernFix
mod_data.description: Improves performance and reduces memory usage

mod_data.name: ImmediatelyFast
mod_data.description: Speeds up the immediate mode rendering performance of the client

mod_data.name: FerriteCore
mod_data.description: Memory usage optimizations

mod_data.name: Krypton
mod_data.description: Optimises the Minecraft networking stack

mod_data.name: ThreadTweak
mod_data.description: Improves and tweaks the Minecraft thread scheduling

mod_data.name: Sodium Extra
mod_data.description: Ports most of Optifine's options over to Sodium

mod_data.name: Reese's Sodium Options
mod_data.description: Alternative options menu for Sodium

mod_data.name: Iris Shaders
mod_data.description: The best shaders mod

mod_data.name: Continuity
mod_data.description: Connected textures and emissive textures

mod_data.name: LambDynamicLights
mod_data.description: Dynamic lights

mod_data.name: Nuit
mod_data.description: Custom skyboxes

mod_data.name: Nuit Interop
mod_data.description: Allows using Optifine skybox resource packs with Nuit

mod_data.name: Dark Loading Screen
mod_data.description: Makes the loading screen darker

mod_data.name: Tweakeroo
mod_data.description: Adds a whole bunch of client-side "tweaks" to the game

mod_data.name: TweakerMore
mod_data.description: Adds even more client-side tweaks to the game

mod_data.name: Litematica
mod_data.description: A client-side schematic mod with extra features for creative mode work

mod_data.name: Litemoretica
mod_data.description: Adds features and fixes to Litematica

mod_data.name: Syncmatica
mod_data.description: Enables sharing litematic placements with other players

mod_data.name: MiniHUD
mod_data.description: A "mini F3" HUD mod, also with various overlays like light level, spawn chunks, slime chunks etc.

mod_data.name: Item Scroller
mod_data.description: Adds many shortcuts to move items more easily and craft faster in inventory screens

mod_data.name: Masa Gadget
mod_data.description: Additional features for Masa's mods

mod_data.name: MasaAdditions
mod_data.description: Addon mod for Tweakeroo, MiniHUD and Litematica

mod_data.name: Mod Menu
mod_data.description: Adds a mod menu to view the list of mods you have installed

mod_data.name: ClientCommands
mod_data.description: Adds lots of useful client-side commands

mod_data.name: EssentialClient
mod_data.description: Adds many utilities and provides a GUI to modify carpet rules

mod_data.name: Axiom
mod_data.description: An all-in-one tool for Minecraft editing

mod_data.name: WorldEdit
mod_data.description: A tool to make building a lot faster

mod_data.name: WorldEdit CUI
mod_data.description: Adds visual outlines for WorldEdit areas
notes: In versions 1.20.5-1.21.4 <https://modrinth.com/mod/wecuifix> must also be installed

mod_data.name: Redstone Multimeter
mod_data.description: An intuitive redstone debugging tool

mod_data.name: Flashback
mod_data.description: Allows recording gameplay and playing it back later

mod_data.name: Isometric Renders
mod_data.description: Allows the creation of high-resolution isometric screenshots of game objects

mod_data.name: Pick Block Pro
mod_data.description: An advanced client-side Block, Entity, NBT, Tool and ID picker

mod_data.name: Pistorder
mod_data.description: Visually shows the block movement order of a piston

mod_data.name: G4mespeed
mod_data.description: Utility mod that improves the reliability and experience of changing tick rate, and adds many quality of life features

mod_data.name: Inv View
mod_data.description: Allows opening and manipulating the inventories and ender chests of online and offline players

mod_data.name: Chunk Debug
mod_data.description: Adds a map with information about the currently loaded chunks

mod_data.name: CommandKeys
mod_data.description: A powerful command macro mod

mod_data.name: Technical Utilities
mod_data.description: Provides client-side tweaks for Litematica, WorldEdit and other small utilities

mod_data.name: Spark
mod_data.description: A performance profiler for Minecraft clients, servers and proxies

mod_data.name: ViaFabricPlus
mod_data.description: Allows connecting to every Minecraft server version

mod_data.name: VoxelMap
mod_data.description: A minimap and worldmap mod

mod_data.name: Auth Me
mod_data.description: Makes it possible to authenticate yourself and re-validate your session without having to close the game

mod_data.name: Zoomify
mod_data.description: A simple customisable zoom mod

mod_data.name: Twitch Chat Bridge
mod_data.description: Allows linking a Twitch channel's chat to your Minecraft chatbox

mod_data.name: No Chat Reports
mod_data.description: Makes chat unreportable (where possible)

mod_data.name: Organizable Play Screens
mod_data.description: Allows organising worlds and servers with folders in the play screens

mod_data.name: Recursive Resources
mod_data.description: Enhances the Resource Pack menu with folder support

mod_data.name: FastQuit
mod_data.description: Makes it possible to return to the title screen early while a world is still saving in the background

mod_data.name: ClearDespawn Reworked
mod_data.description: Makes items blink when they are about to despawn

mod_data.name: Paginated Advancements
mod_data.description: Implements a better advancements screen

mod_data.name: Too Many Shortcuts
mod_data.description: Improves keys and controls setup by providing modifier keys and enabling multi-functional keys

mod_data.name: NBT Autocomplete
mod_data.description: Adds suggestions for NBT tags in commands

mod_data.name: Compact Chat
mod_data.description: Removes duplicate messages from chat

mod_data.name: AppleSkin
mod_data.description: Adds food/hunger-related HUD improvements

mod_data.name: Fabrishot
mod_data.description: Allows taking high-resolution screenshots

mod_data.name: Sound Controller
mod_data.description: Provides complete control over the volume of every sound in the game

mod_data.name: Map In Slot
mod_data.description: Makes maps render in inventory/hotbar slots

mod_data.name: Respackopts
mod_data.description: Adds config menus for resource packs

mod_data.name: Cubes Without Borders
mod_data.description: Allows playing Minecraft in a borderless fullscreen window

mod_data.name: Language Reload
mod_data.description: Reduces load times and adds fallbacks for languages

mod_data.name: Better Suggestions
mod_data.description: Makes command suggestions more useful

mod_data.name: Suggestion Tweaker
mod_data.description: Improves the way suggestions are filtered and sorted when writing a command

mod_data.name: Disable Custom Worlds Advice
mod_data.description: Disables the annoying "Experimental Features" advice

mod_data.name: MixinTrace
mod_data.description: Adds a list of mixins to classes in the stack trace of crash reports

mod_data.name: Packet Fixer
mod_data.description: Fixes various problems with packets, nbt, and timeouts

mod_data.name: Model Gap Fix
mod_data.description: Fixes gaps in block models and item models

mod_data.name: ToolTipFix
mod_data.description: Stops tooltips that are too large to fit on the screen from running off the screen

mod_data.name: FastOpenLinksAndFolders
mod_data.description: Prevents the game from blocking when opening a chat link, a screenshot or the resourcepacks/datapacks folders
